Container.Name: changeEpisodesLanguage
Container.Overview: Sets MKV default tracks for anime episodes to Japanese audio and English full subtitles by scanning Sonarr, optionally skipping files still seeding in Transmission.

Config.Name: Media
Config.Description: Map to your media root so the container can read and edit MKV files.

Config.Name: Exclude seeding
Config.Description: Exclude files still seeding in Transmission.

Config.Name: Transmission RPC URL
Config.Description: Transmission RPC endpoint. Required if EXCLUDE_SEEDING=true.

Config.Name: PATH_MAP_FROM
Config.Description: Rewrite prefix for Sonarr → Transmission path mapping (optional).

Config.Name: PATH_MAP_TO
Config.Description: Rewrite prefix target for Sonarr → Transmission path mapping (optional).

Config.Name: FILE_PATH_MAP_FROM
Config.Description: Rewrite prefix for Sonarr → Container file path mapping (optional).

Config.Name: FILE_PATH_MAP_TO
Config.Description: Rewrite prefix target for Sonarr → Container file path mapping (optional).

Config.Name: Run once
Config.Description: If true, run a single scan and exit.

Config.Name: Dry run
Config.Description: If true, log planned changes without modifying files.
